abstract: Woot is one of a cluster of shopping sites that have sprung up in the last few years in a wave of e-commerce innovations.
snippet: Woot is one of a cluster of shopping sites that have sprung up in the last few years in a wave of e-commerce innovations.
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com, which sells millions of products, said Wednesday that it had agreed to buy Woot, a site that sells one item at a time.

headline.main: With Purchase of Woot, a Daily Deal Site, Amazon Expands Its Inventory
headline.print_headline: With Purchase of Woot, a Daily Deal Site, Amazon Expands Its Inventory
